required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Diclofenac 25mg/Paracetamol 500 mg and Diclofenac 50 mg/Paracetamol 500 mg for Patients With Pain
clinical_study.official_title: Incidence of Adverse Events, Risk Factors, and Drug Utilization Factors Related to Treatment With Diclofenac 25 MG/Paracetamol 500 MG and Diclofenac 50 MG/Paracetamol 500 MG in Patients From Metropolitan Lima

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to collect adverse events and identify risk factors in patients that are taking Dolocordralan Extra 25® and Dolocordralan Extra Forte®

primary_outcome.measure: Incidence rate of adverse events (AEs) in patients receiving treatment with Dolocordralan Extra 25 and and Dolocordralan Extra Forte in patients from Metropolitan Lima records
primary_outcome.description: Ongoing events will be followed up until event resolution

secondary_outcome.measure: Observed AEs in patients receiving treatment with Dolocordralan Extra 25 and Dolocordralan Extra Forte in patients from Metropolitan Lima records
Risk factors in patients experiencing adverse events while receiving treatment with Dolocordralan Extra 25 and Dolocordralan Extra Forte in patients from Metropolitan Lima records
secondary_outcome.description: Risk factors: medical history, concomitant diseases and concomitant treatment

secondary_outcome.measure: Drug utilization factors in patients receiving treatment with Dolocordralan Extra 25 and Dolocordralan Extra Forte in patients from Metropolitan Lima records
secondary_outcome.description: Drug utilization factors: Dosing frequency, intake conditions, storage, and concomitant medications

study_pop.textblock: Patients 18 years of age or and older from 6 medical centers from Metropolitan Lima, Peru who received at least one dose of Dolocordralan Extra 25 or Dolocordralan Extra Forte according to product label indications will be included in this study

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Patients who are prescribed Dolocordralan Extra 25 and Dolocordralan Extra Forte at any of the participating clinics
- Patients who sign the informed consent form
- Patients who agree to comply with the study procedures
Exclusion Criteria:
- Please see the protocol for further information on exclusion criteria
